title: We Want to Keep the Festival Going!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Heave-ho... Heave-ho...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Whoa! Lanzhu, what are you carrying!? I’ll help you carry the other half!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Thanks, Ai. Please help me distribute these to everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Okie-dokie. Hey everyone, we’ve got a massive pile of documents from Lanzhu!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Documents? There’s something that we need to submit at this time of the year?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Did we... Did we forget something!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Let me see... Ah, no, no, it’s not an application form or anything like that. Don’t worry.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Th-this is...!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>These are the comments from everyone who came to our event!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Wow~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>That’s right! I printed them all out. You all would want to take a good look at them, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Great idea! Now we can read them anytime we want!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kukkukku... The cries of the little demons who’ve survived the strange festival born from the bottom of the abyss...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Huh? The event was during the day, though, Yoshiko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s about the image, the image! And it’s not Yoshiko. It’s Yohane!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>So many people shared their thoughts with us...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I’m moved!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ah, there are people who posted pictures too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>...Huh? Is this...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Is that Kanata-san and the others?!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Huuuh!? What!? They took so many photos!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>...Maybe Ruby should post some photos too. The ones I took with my big sis.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Nico’s got some awesome photos too...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu does too! Hey, we can’t lose! Let’s post our photos too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>But but! I want to read the comments, too, zura~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
